thread.title: You can now search Facebook's 2 trillion posts like Google - Tech
thread.title_full: You can now search Facebook's 2 trillion posts like Google - Tech News - Digital Spy

author: Jack Klompus
title: You can now search Facebook's 2 trillion posts like Google - Tech
text: Facebook is now letting you search its history of posts with a Google-style engine called Search FYI.The social network has retooled its search function so users can now find out what the whole world is saying about the latest topics. Â© Facebook Search FYI has an index of 2 trillion posts. There are already over 1.5 billion searches per day on Facebook, but this could well rise with Search FYI.The improved engine says that it offers "better search suggestions" by highlighting what's happening right now related to what you type; search results with public posts as well as posts from friends; and public conversations, where you can find public posts about a specific link.The updates are rolling out now in US English on iPhone, Android and desktop.Meanwhile, an Irish data watchdog has been ordered to probe Facebook's data transfers to the US following allegations that the firm is in cahoots with American spy agencies.Watch a preview of Search FYI below:
